license.title: Photo License
license.allRightsReservedDesc: Traditional copyright - visitors cannot use these photos without permission
license.ccByDesc: Visitors can use, share, and modify these photos, even commercially, as long as they provide attribution
license.ccBySaDesc: Visitors can use and modify these photos, but derivative works must use the same license
license.ccByNdDesc: Visitors can share these photos but cannot modify them
license.ccByNcDesc: Visitors can use and modify these photos for non-commercial purposes only
license.ccByNcSaDesc: Non-commercial use only, and derivative works must use the same license
license.ccByNcNdDesc: Most restrictive Creative Commons license - non-commercial sharing only, no modifications allowed
license.cc0Desc: All rights waived - visitors can use these photos for any purpose without attribution
license.publicDomainDesc: These photographs are in the public domain - free for anyone to use without restrictions
license.allRightsReservedFullText: All rights reserved. No part of these photographs may be reproduced, distributed, or used in any form without express written permission from the copyright holder. If you would like to use any of these photographs, please contact me to request permission.
license.ccByFullText: These photographs are licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License. You are free to share (copy and redistribute) and adapt (remix, transform, and build upon) these photographs for any purpose, even commercially, as long as you give appropriate credit, provide a link to the license, and indicate if changes were made.
license.ccBySaFullText: These photographs are licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International License. You are free to share and adapt these photographs, even commercially, as long as you give appropriate credit and distribute derivative works under the same license.
license.ccByNdFullText: These photographs are licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NoDerivatives 4.0 International License. You are free to share these photographs for any purpose, even commercially, as long as you give appropriate credit and do not make any modifications.
license.ccByNcFullText: These photographs are licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International License. You are free to share and adapt these photographs for non-commercial purposes only, as long as you give appropriate credit.
license.ccByNcSaFullText: These photographs are licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License. You are free to share and adapt these photographs for non-commercial purposes only, as long as you give appropriate credit and distribute derivative works under the same license.
license.ccByNcNdFullText: These photographs are licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-NoDerivatives 4.0 International License. You are free to share these photographs for non-commercial purposes only, as long as you give appropriate credit and do not make any modifications.
license.cc0FullText: These photographs have been dedicated to the public domain under the Creative Commons CC0 1.0 Universal Public Domain Dedication. To the extent possible under law, I have waived all copyright and related rights to these photographs. You can copy, modify, distribute and perform the work, even for commercial purposes, all without asking permission.
license.publicDomainFullText: These photographs are in the public domain. They are free for anyone to use, modify, and distribute for any purpose without restriction.
license.copyrightText: ¬© {{year}} {{siteName}}. All photographs on this website are protected by copyright law.
license.attributionText: If you use these photographs under this license, please provide attribution as follows:
license.permissionsText: If you would like to use any photographs from this website, please contact the photographer to request permission.

passwordReset.footerAutomatic: This is an automated message, please do not reply to this email.

securitySetup.title: üîê Secure Your Account
securitySetup.description: Your account is currently protected only by a password. We strongly recommend setting up additional security measures to protect your account.
securitySetup.mfaBenefit1: Adds an extra layer of security with time-based codes
securitySetup.mfaBenefit2: Works with apps like Google Authenticator or Authy
securitySetup.mfaBenefit3: Get backup codes for account recovery
securitySetup.passkeysBenefit1: Use biometrics or device PIN for quick, secure login
securitySetup.passkeysBenefit2: No passwords needed - just your fingerprint or face
securitySetup.passkeysBenefit3: Can be set up after enabling MFA
securitySetup.scanQrCode: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app (Google Authenticator, Authy, 1Password, etc.)
securitySetup.enterVerificationCode: Enter verification code from your app

notifications.bannerTitle: Get Notified When Processing Jobs Complete
notifications.bannerDescription: Enable push notifications to receive alerts when your video processing and image optimization jobs finish. You can work on other tabs or applications while jobs run in the background.

notifications.blocked: Notifications blocked by browser. Check your browser settings.
notifications.subscribePrompt: Subscribe to receive notifications when jobs complete
notifications.notSupported: Push notifications are not supported in this browser
notifications.serverDisabled: Push notifications are disabled on the server

settings.title: Push Notifications
settings.description: Notify managers and admins when video processing and image optimization jobs complete
settings.enabledDescription: When enabled, managers and admins will be prompted to allow browser notifications
settings.vapidSubjectHint: Contact email (mailto:) or website URL (https://) for the push service
settings.vapidPublicKeyHint: Public key for browser subscription (safe to share)
settings.generateKeysWarning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Warning: Generating new keys will invalidate all existing subscriptions
settings.confirmMessage: This will generate new VAPID keys and invalidate all existing push notification subscriptions. All users will need to re-subscribe to receive notifications.
